page.title: 01My Village - East Hoathly
page.content: The village is small, it has one grocer's. Also a butcher's, garage, post office and two pubs. The school is next to the Church. The recreation ground has a play area, tennis courts, cricket and football pitches. There is a dangerous bend on the busy A22 which runs through the centre of the village. The churches of Chiddingly and East Hoathly have the same Rector, Rev.P.Amos. In East Hoathly there are a number of light industries also farming and forestry. There is a Stud Farm on the Waldron Road which owns a lot of the farm land.
